page.title: 12Clubs and Organisations
page.content: Clubs and social organisations within the grid area: {for children and young people-} Cub Scouts Boy Scouts Brownies Girl Guides Coates Youth Club Coates pre-school playgroup (all held at Coates Primary School) Sunday School (Coates Parish Church) {for adults-} Womens' Institute Silver Lining Club (Elderly people) Coates Cricket Club (all based at the Village Hall) Feldale Pit Committee (village committee to administer community owned recreational area at a flooded and reclaimed gravel pit) Coates Village Show committee.
